tool_input.command:
cat > /tmp/floyd_salvage_strategy.md << 'EOF'
# FLOYD SUITE - Salvage Strategy for Independent Applications

## OPTION 1: Copy to Separate Repositories (Recommended)

### FloydDesktopWeb
```bash
# Create independent repo
cd /Volumes/Storage
mkdir FloydDesktopWeb-Standalone
cd FloydDesktopWeb-Standalone
git init

# Copy source (exclude node_modules, dist)
rsync -av \
  --exclude=node_modules \
  --exclude=dist \
  --exclude=dist-server \
  --exclude=.git \
  /Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI/FloydDesktopWeb/ .

git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit: FloydDesktopWeb standalone"
```

### TUI REBUILD
```bash
cd /Volumes/Storage
mkdir TUI-Rebuild-Standalone
cd TUI-Rebuild-Standalone
git init

rsync -av \
  --exclude=node_modules \
  --exclude=dist \
  --exclude=.git \
  /Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI/TUI\ REBUILD/ .

git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit: TUI REBUILD standalone"
```

## OPTION 2: Git Subtree Split (Cleaner History)

```bash
# Split FloydDesktopWeb into its own repo
cd /Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI
git subtree split --prefix=FloydDesktopWeb --branch=floyd-desktop-web-branch

# Create new repo from that branch
mkdir /Volumes/Storage/FloydDesktopWeb-Standalone
cd /Volumes/Storage/FloydDesktopWeb-Standalone
git init
git pull /Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI floyd-desktop-web-branch

# Same for TUI
cd /Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI
git subtree split --prefix=TUI\ REBUILD --branch=tui-rebuild-branch

mkdir /Volumes/Storage/TUI-Rebuild-Standalone
cd /Volumes/Storage/TUI-Rebuild-Standalone
git init
git pull /Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI tui-rebuild-branch
```

## OPTION 3: Symlink Farm (Keep in Place, Isolate Builds)

Create a symlink-based structure pointing to the working dirs:

```bash
mkdir -p ~/FloydApps
cd ~/FloydApps

# Symlink to working directories
ln -s /Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI/FloydDesktopWeb ./DesktopWeb
ln -s "/Volumes/Storage/FLOYD_CLI/TUI REBUILD" ./TUI

# Now you have:
# ~/FloydApps/DesktopWeb -> independent
# ~/FloydApps/TUI -> independent
```

## RECOMMENDED: Option 3 (Symlinks)

**Why?**
- ✅ No copying/moving files
- ✅ Changes in original = changes in symlink
- ✅ Easy to add to PATH
- ✅ Can snapshot/backup anytime

## Verification Commands

After extracting, verify they still work:

```bash
# DesktopWeb
cd ~/FloydApps/DesktopWeb  # or /Volumes/Storage/FloydDesktopWeb-Standalone
npm install
npm run build
npm run dev  # Should work identically

# TUI
cd ~/FloydApps/TUI  # or /Volumes/Storage/TUI-Rebuild-Standalone
npm install
npm run build
npm start  # Should work identically
```

## Dependency Check (Both Use Only npm Packages)

FloydDesktopWeb needs:
- @anthropic-ai/sdk
- express
- react
- vite
- All from npm registry ✅

TUI REBUILD needs:
- ink
- react
- zustand
- All from npm registry ✅

**No local dependencies = 100% portable**
EOF
cat /tmp/floyd_salvage_strategy.md
